name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Shell Command Execution
description: This playbook addresses the incident of unauthorized shell command execution through a web application vulnerability, aiming to terminate unauthorized processes, isolate the affected host, restore the system, and enhance security.

action--a3c1b2d5-9373-4a9a-b856-2e6e44bc.name: Terminate unauthorized shell processes
action--a3c1b2d5-9373-4a9a-b856-2e6e44bc.description: Terminate any unauthorized shell processes that may be running.

action--4dbe9ed7-4102-4f94-8416-d4017578.name: Identify and isolate compromised host
action--4dbe9ed7-4102-4f94-8416-d4017578.description: Bring down the network interface to isolate any compromised host.

action--ecf7a91b-fe0a-4d48-97b5-9fae0f6d.name: Restore system from known clean state
action--ecf7a91b-fe0a-4d48-97b5-9fae0f6d.description: Restore the system to a known clean state using the latest backup.

parallel--2819fea6-9dac-4d82-8cbc-1a7f5e.name: Scan for persistence mechanisms and update policies
parallel--2819fea6-9dac-4d82-8cbc-1a7f5e.description: Scan for persistence mechanisms and update security policies in parallel.

action--2819fea6-9dac-4d82-8cbc-1a7f5e1d.name: Scan for persistence mechanisms
action--2819fea6-9dac-4d82-8cbc-1a7f5e1d.description: Identify any persistence mechanisms left by the attacker.

action--ebe4af1e-7c76-401a-b9db-43e62a3c.name: Update security policy to log shell access attempts
action--ebe4af1e-7c76-401a-b9db-43e62a3c.description: Enhance security policy to ensure logging of unauthorized shell access attempts.

loop--d9f50cc4-d534-4da7-8ca9-994a7f3ecf.name: Scan Loop Until Clean
loop--d9f50cc4-d534-4da7-8ca9-994a7f3ecf.description: Continue scanning for backdoors until the system is clean.
